about_the_game:
Ardent Wilds is an action-packed survival game featuring fast-paced combat, epic loot, and endless customization.

Equip your character with powerful gear, unlocking millions of ability combinations for chaotic, thrilling battles.

Conquer challenging bosses, explore ancient dungeons, and shape a fully destructible world—solo or with friends in online co-op.

With its unpredictable, emergent gameplay and creative freedom, Ardent Wilds delivers an exhilarating survival experience like no other.

Not only can you dig and sculpt our voxel-based terrain with a shovel, but you can also carve out intricate sculptures or excavate entire mountains. Many items and abilities interact with the environment too—bombs and pyroblasts leave craters, while the Tome of Ice lets you create a frost bridge as you walk over canyons. If you've ever dreamed of controlling the elements like an earthbender, Ardent Wilds is the game for you.

Gather materials to construct and upgrade your base. Craft powerful armor and weapons at your specialized stations.

Create your dream fantasy home with a wide range of furniture and decorations, or elevate your journey by growing crops, cooking delicious meals, and brewing powerful elixirs to aid you in battle.

Venture deep into caves and ancient underground fortresses, where danger lurks around every corner. As you explore these dark, labyrinthine caverns, you'll face deadly traps, fierce enemies, and hidden secrets waiting to be uncovered. But the risk is worth the reward—valuable loot, rare materials, and powerful artifacts lie buried within, ready for those brave enough to claim them. 

Forge powerful armor and weapons at your crafting stations, using materials you've gathered along your journey. Alternatively, some of the best gear can be looted from your fallen foes. Whether you craft or conquer, each piece of equipment will enhance your strength and prepare you for even greater challenges ahead.

Prepare to face off against epic bosses in intense, heart-pounding battles that will test your skills and strategy. You'll need to bring your best gear, abilities, and teamwork to stand a chance. Victory comes with rich rewards—defeating these mighty adversaries grants you access to legendary loot, rare items, and powerful weapons that can greatly enhance your abilities. 

Ardent Wilds offers online co-op for up to 6 players*, letting you and your friends explore and conquer together.

(*Player count can be increased beyond 6, though the game is not balanced for larger groups.)

Additional Features

  • Extensive modding capabilities: all game objects, creatures, abilities and combat effects are programmable using our Lua API. Need some examples? All scripts for our existing content is shipped with the game and is visible and accessible for you to tinker with.

  • Customize your hero with a myriad of hair styles, beards, colors & other customization options.

  • No internet? No problem! The game can be played in multiplayer over the Local Network (LAN) as well as Steam.

Equip your character with powerful gear, unlocking millions of ability combinations for chaotic, thrilling battles.

name: Ardent Wilds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.6 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ardent Wilds is a fast-paced action survival game with epic loot, endless ability combinations, and chaotic combat. Conquer bosses, explore destructible worlds, and dive into dungeons solo or with friends. Unleash your skills and creativity in this thrilling fantasy adventure!
